title: DERC scam token
body:
Hello,

I was scammed into purchasing fraudulent DeRace (DERC) tokens. Unfortunately, the contract address I received was fraudulent. I am not able to sell any amount of those tokens I now hold. I was told this is called a "Honeypot scam". Thank God for my crypto scam insurance.

Please help me to recover my funds. I spent about $150 on that fraudulent token.

1. DeRace Token
https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/derace/
https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/derace

2. Affected Wallet: 
0xa66dD3A7798fBC3184ab8c1a5C605BF6FCaeD42a

3. Happened on Aug 4, 2021

4. Email Address: reign3gm@protonmail.com

5. Transaction ID: 0x9c1804760fd0761035362ac9eb3245163804ec66b96cfaedeffefb50f79296aa


Thank you so much for your help ! Have a blessed day !
author: 0xFca23eA25E8e997e5E32AA22Bb242cf2ff5874f6
